title.rendered: Top 10 Ecommerce Platforms for Start-ups, Enterprises, and Small Business [Infographic]

content.rendered:
There is no doubt that selling any product online is one of the best ways to sell hundreds of products and reach thousands of people across the globe at an affordable cost.

In 2019, the eCommerce development market generated a revenue of $6.2 billion, and it is predicted to grow at a CAGR of 16.3% during 2020-2027. Due to the reduction in the cost of development and increasing adoption of online e-commerce development platforms combines with ease of online business is predicted to boost the market. 

Ecommerce software development offers various benefits to start-ups, enterprises, and entrepreneurs, which we will discuss in this blog. Firstly, we will discuss the list of e-commerce platforms used for web or mobile application development. 

So, here is the list of the top 10 E-commerce platforms to use for mobile or web app development- 

  • Shopify 
  • WooCommerce 
  • PrestaShop
  • BigCommerce 
  • Volusion 
  • GoDaddy 
  • Wix 
  • Magento
  • Drupal 
  • OpenCart

Top 10 E-commerce platforms {Infographic}

Now, coming to the next part of our blog that is why we should opt for ecommerce website development. Well! E-commerce development offers a plethora of benefits to start-ups, enterprises, and entrepreneurs which are as listed below- 

  • Low financial cost 
  • Better flexibility 
  • Sell Internationally
  • Various payment modes 
  • Targeted communication 
  • Faster response 
  • Affordable advertising 

Thousands of companies are now investing in e-commerce website development to boost their brand image in the market. List of companies using e-commerce development platforms- 

  • eBay
  • Wallmart 
  • Alibaba
  • Amazon 
  • Rakuten 

Also Read: A Comprehensive Guide To Launch eCommerce Business In 2021

Conclusion 

For deploying ecommerce website development benefits into your business, you need to consult an e-commerce software company or hire ecommerce developers. So, where to find it? 

Well, ValueCoders is a top-notch e-commerce development company in India that has 16+ years of experience in delivering high-performing, result-oriented, and technology-driven solutions to start-ups, enterprises, and entrepreneurs. 

Want to hire e-commerce website developers? Contact ValueCoders!
